::RebelYell::
Somehow RebelYell made his way from the battle without
being noticed.He could barely walk, and mech fluid was
flowing from his wounds. He transformed to beast
mode(a bear) and hoped that his systems could begin
internal repairs. That much he could remember, though
everything was another matter.
